Package.Name: 15m Spot Circle
Package.Description: Shows a 15m Circle around your tank. \r\nIt shows the minimum distance behind bushes to stay hidden if you are shooting.\r\nThe Ring is not displayed in sniper view.

Package.Name: 15m Spot Circle in different colors
Package.Description:
Shows a 15m Circle around your tank. Its the minimum distance behind bushes if you are shooting you stay hidden. In the sniper scope ring is not displayed

Now again different colors available

Package.Name: For Locastan Skin

Package.Name: Show Turret Angles on Minimap
Package.Description: This will show the turret traverse angles on the minimap

Package.Name: Enemy spotted status
Package.Description: This is a Spotted Status Indicator for the enemy team. Different icons show the current Spotted Status for the vehicle.\r\n\r\n by OldSkool

Package.Name: Use colored asterisk "*" from Willster419's xvm config
Tank Rating Colors
Package.InternalNotes: Maybe conflict with "Contour skins with areas of penetration" or just hard to see
Package.Author: CHAMPi
Package.Description:
Repaints tanks based on winrate or WGR value without any textures!
use ESC in the hangar and then click on MOD Settings

features:
 - you can decide which tank parts are painted (hull, chassis, turret, gun)
 - you can choose which tanks are painted (enemy tanks, ally tanks and/or your own tank)
 - you can control if camouflages are removed before the tanks are painted (not all are currently removed - in work!)
 - you can set the gloss and metallic effect for the color.
 - graphical user interface to control the most important settings

Package.Name: PROTanki
Package.Description:
Combat efficiency calculator for World of Tanks.

Maud calculates the expected damage for each tank right during the battle.

The negative value of the damage shows how much you need to fill the damage so that its value is above average.

He considers the costs of silver spent in combat.

Package.Name: RaJCeL
Package.Description: Mod is showing some statistics in battle and replays. Mod doesn’t need XVM to work.\r\n\r\nNot working on NA server as of 1.5.1 (06-15-2019)

Package.Name: InBattle timer HARPOON
Package.Author: lenya69
Package.Description: InBattle timer in the upper right corner.\r\n\nPart of Harpoon Crosshair by lenya69

Package.Name: Marks of Excellence Extended (formerly called "Marks on Gun Extended")
Package.Author: spoter, OldSkool
Package.Description:
Real time MoE (Marks of Excellence) progress on current tank in battle.

Switch between configurations with ALT+NUM9

Originally created by Spoter, now maintained by Oldskool.
Package.UpdateComment:
Version 13
- Bugfix

Version 10
- Mod is now named "marksInHangar" - fixed vehicleStuckInGarage Crash

Package.Name: #4 - Circon`s config ( <- our previous default one!)
Expected Vehicle Values
Package.InternalNotes: with prePatch to disable options first
Package.Author: Champi
Package.Description: Shows expected vehicle damage, marks of excellence percentage and many more infos in real time during the battle. Highly customizable!

Package.Name: show dealt damage/tank in players panel
Gold Ammo Visibility Mod
Package.Author: lgfrbcsgo
Package.Description:
Features
- Changes the color of hit effects
- Multiple colors choices available
- Works for all tanks in both teams
- Recolors penetrating hits, bouncing shots, ricochets, shots hitting the ground or other objects
- Does NOT recolor none penetrating hits or shots into water

This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

FAQ
Q: The Mod isn't working.
A: Make sure Extra Effects are enabled in the settings under Graphics.


by lgfrbcsgo

Package.Name: RTAN by Aimdrol
Package.Description: INFO: Will change the 6th sense sound to version 1.

Package.Name: Show Personal Missions in Detail ("Quests")

by izeberg

Package.Name: OldSkool

features:
- Default layout of masheene (THX!)

- By ALT button, the ability to view your own vehicle
- Ingame configurator

Package.Name: TessuMod - WOT/Teamspeak integration (installation guide in description)
Package.Author: jhakonen
Package.Description:
A modification for integrating TeamSpeak into Garage and Battle.

Only works with the 64bit version of Teamspeak!

YOU MUST ACTIVATE THE MOD IN TEAMSPEAK FIRST!
 to add it to your teamspeak installation, finish the installation of mods and then go to your WoT-directory (..\World_of_Tanks\mods\versiondir). there you doubleclick the file "tessumod_plugin_0.8.0_win64.ts3_plugin" and follow the on-screen-steps.

More instructions here: 
http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/433614-09171-tessumod-wotteamspeak-integration-mod-v0613-26032017/#topmost

Package.Name: Wide Border of Maps
Package.Description:
This mod was made to help people with color blindness. 

WIDE - borderline width = 1 pixel
INTENSIVE - the borderline width = 20 pixels

GRID - like "INTENSIVE"; with gridlines (10x10).
EXTRAGRID - like "INTENSIVE" with gridlines (50x50).

COMMAND - like "GRID", but with numbered grids (big font).
SPG - like "GRID", but with numbered grids (small font).
